methods.description: Get historical prices for requested currency pairs

parameters.name: pairs
parameters.description: comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), 
followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:
y=year,
m=month,
w=week,
d=day,
h=hour,
mi=minute

For example, a yearly interval can be specified as "y" and 6 month interval as "6m". 

If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml

methods.description: Get list of currency pairs supported by the history endpoint

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml

methods.description: Get historical benchmark prices for requested metals

parameters.name: metals
parameters.description: comma separated list of metals

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), 
followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:
y=year,
m=month,
w=week,
d=day,
h=hour,
mi=minute

For example, a yearly interval can be specified as "y" and 6 month interval as "6m". 

If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day.

parameters.name: historicalfx
parameters.description: if true use historical currency rates otherwise current currency rates. Defaults to true.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: comma separated list of conversion currencies, defaults to USD

parameters.name: unitofmeasure
parameters.description:
unit of meaure, defaults to troy ounces. allowed values are:
mg=milligram
g=gram
kg=kilogram
gr=grain
oz=ounce
toz=troy ounce
ct=carat
dwt=pennyweight

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml

apiDescription: [nFusion Solutions](https://nfusionsolutions.com) provides [REST APIs](https://nfusionsolutions.com/data-feeds/) that deliver enterprise-grade financial data. Data sets include real-time and historical pricing for Spot prices of precious metals such as Gold, Silver, Platinum, and Palladium, exchange rates for major currency pairs, exchange rates for Crypto Currencies such as BTC, ETH, and LTC. All API access requires authentication. In order to be issued access credentials you must first enter into a service agreement with nFusion Solutions and acquire a commercial license. For information on how to obtain a licence [take a tour of our products](https://nfusionsolutions.com/nfusion-solutions-metals-gold-price-feed-tour/) or email sales@nfusionsolutions.com.
